description: Try our easy to follow Nanna's Waffles With Banana "Ice-Cream" recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Nanna's Waffles With Banana "Ice-Cream" Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top waffle stacks with sliced kiwi fruit, grapes and a scoop of your delicious banana 'ice-cream'.
